import React from 'react'; import './AboutUs.css'; import ZetaClassImage from '../assets/ZetaClass.png'; const AboutUs = () => { return (

Upsilon Epsilon Chapter

Who is theta tau

Our Core Pillars

Brotherhood

We are a group of tight-knit engineering students that love to spend time together on and off campus. We have events such as BBQs and beach days, and actively participate in SCU intramurals.

Service

We prioritize both academic and social engagement. We organize various events like barbecues, beach days, and participation in SCU intramural sports to cultivate strong connections and a lively campus community.

Professional Development

We push each other to become better students, engineers, and people. We host resume workshops, practice interviews, and other events.

Our History

One of the core foundations of Santa Clara University (SCU) is to create a community of well-rounded and globally conscious individuals, including those within the engineering school. However, for a long time, many engineering students felt the need for an organization to establish a shared community...

GOT A QUESTION?

For any general questions, please email [placeholder email]

); }; export default AboutUs;
